nodes.text: "Star Wars Inside Intel: Hyperspace" is a StarWars.com article written by Lucasfilm Story Group member Emily Shkoukani. Part of the Star Wars Inside Intel article series, it covers the topic of hyperspace and the technical requirements needed to travel through it. The article also discusses the history of lightspeed travel as well the purrgil, a species that could naturally access the dimension of hyperspace.
Want to learn more about lightspeed travel in the galaxy far, far away? Punch it!
